name: Tas: The Angel King
description:
The first game of the Angel Series - Tas: The Angel King. There will be updates on the development when a part of the game is done.

The demo 0.1v of the game, which Celestial Indie Games are working on.

Development on the game started on 25th of February and since it's gone a long way, the final game will be free. So expect it in about 2-3 months.
